name: scaffold-module
description: Scaffold new modules and components for pplx-sdk following the layered architecture and established code patterns.

module_name.description: Name of the new module to create

layer.description: Target architecture layer (core, shared, transport, domain, client)

outputs.source_file: Path to the created source file
outputs.test_file: Path to the created test file

prompt: Create a new module '{{module_name}}' in the '{{layer}}' layer of pplx-sdk. Purpose: {{purpose}}. Include: from __future__ import annotations, proper typing, Google-style docstrings, corresponding test file in tests/, updated __init__.py exports. Verify with mypy and pytest.
